ygData.subject: Is there such thing as alleigance?

Subject: Is there such thing as alleigance?

:::Falcon/Snare/The Destrocons/Sharpedge/Jetstorm/Gigatron:::

::They hear Shredders words::
Ramjet: heh, its pretty funny, one minute WE are Destrons, the next were 
denied by those mystical dudes who say they come from Magmatron, who made us 
Destrons in the first place!
Skywarp: Oh my god... i actually understood that!
Dirge: They are all cowards.  We were Destrons first.
::Snare turns to his brother Falcon::
Snare: Will it ever end?  I mean, we escape from Deathsaurus, and as soon as 
we join the Destrons, all of a sudden alleigance dosnt mean much.
Falcon: Brother, we'll find a way out of this, like we always do!  Shredder 
will not misguid us, im sure.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Sharpedge and Jetstorm hear the argument that the Chosen Mafia were making::
Sharpedge: Im still with ya Deemos.
Jetstorm: me too.  But do ya think the Alliance will accept us? I mean, you 
must admit, they kicked our asses!
Sharpedge: i agree with Jetstorm.  What if they think were weak and kill us?
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Gigatron is getting annoyed himself.  Battle.  That was what the Keepers 
were striving against.  He didnt say anyhting though.  he just looked to 
Kluster::
Gigatron: Who would the battle be against?
